In cases where corroboration is lacking, the Watch Tower Society's instruction is that "the elders will leave the matter in <a1_0>Jehovah's<a1_0/> hands". Anderson says the policies "<b9_0>protect <a2_0><b6_0>pedophiles<b6_0/><a2_0/> rather than protect the <a3_0>children<b9_0/><a3_0/>."
